titles.title: Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide basic and emergency supplemental living assistance grants under the student support services program.
Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act
This bill expands the student support services program to include grants to students at institutions of higher education for basic and emergency supplemental living assistance.
